> Hopefully KUnoichi: Lady Ninja (about Aizu ninja according to the 
> cover) is better.

No.  It is not.  Trust me, it was probably one of the worst movies I
have EVER seen.  

Of course, I did shut it off about halfway through when one of the
kunoichi started shooting "death lasers" out of her breasts,
so...heck, maybe the ending was better than the first half.

Still, I am not quite sure I understand why the hero had to deflower
the virgin kunoichi (while being shot at with arrows) in order to be
able to get them out of the Strange Pit Of Destruction which the Bad
Guy Who Had Been Abducting Brides had in the middle of his living
room...for no apparent reason.  So, if you watch Kunoichi: Lady Ninja,
and feel you can explain that part to me, I would appreciate it.

Angrybee
